snippet: After 266 days of shooting and numerous incidents that threatened the production, Peter Jackson said he had finished principal photography on his planned two-film adaptation of "The Hobbit."
abstract: After 266 days of shooting and numerous incidents that threatened the production, Peter Jackson said he had finished principal photography on his planned two-film adaptation of "The Hobbit."

headline.main: Jackson Says He's Finished Filming on 'The Hobbit'
headline.print_headline: Jackson on ‘The Hobbit’: That’s a Wrap
